alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 7:29PM CST until February 27 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Martin, Obion, Bogota...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 33.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 34.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 34.2 feet and begin rising again early Saturday morning. It will rise to 34.4 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
